title: can't reconnect to the game
body: Hi, my  in last match i was playing in rank game, then i got disconnected but my internet is normal. Then i tried by exiting the game and reconnected but when i logged out, i couldn't reconnect back. There are no symbol or board that i can click in to reconnect to the game. what should i do?

replies.body: Ahhhh sounds like that game might have crashed server side if you never saw an option to reconnect. It's pretty unfortunate, but you won't get any penalties since everyone else was booted from the match as well.
